name: Locket of Warding
entries: This magical Locket contains space for a piece of a Creature to be placed within.
As an Action, you can place a reagent of a Creature within the locket and grant yourself the following benefit based on its CR and Type.

You gain advantage on one saving throw of your choice (which can be changed at dawn) against creatures of that Type. You also gain advantage on saving throws against one condition from the below list against creatures with the same Creature Type as it, based on the CR of the reagent placed within the locket (which can also be changed at dawn).
You only gain these benefits based on the CR of the Reagent placed within the locket for creatures within its CR range or lower, and can only select Conditions based on the Reagents CR.
The Reagent inside the Locket can be replaced by a different reagent, but this consumes the first reagent.
